title: Project Roadmap Tracking Configuration
description: Configuration file schema for Project Roadmap Tracking (.prtrc.json)

$schema.description: Reference to the JSON schema for validation

path.description: Path to the prt.json roadmap file

cache.description: Caching configuration for the roadmap repository

enabled.description: Enable in-memory caching of roadmap data

maxSize.description: Maximum number of roadmaps to cache (LRU eviction)

watchFiles.description: Watch roadmap files for external changes and auto-invalidate cache
